Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2007 1:09 AM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] PBS, "Secrets Of The Samurai Sword"



At the end of the 9/11 PBS documentary tonight, there was a trailer
for a coming feature, "Secrets Of The Samurai Sword", broadcast date
not indicated. So get ready, sandpaper "polish" your battered and
butchered Bungo wak and be prepared for the big pop in sales prices!
Fortune favors the prepared!!!

NC ;o)
